content.question: In the second sentence of the first paragraph, the authors mention cookbooks, catalogues, and telephone books primarily to

choices.label: illustrate the broad array of objects that are organized by scientific principles
concede that rational argumentation can sometimes lead to absurd conclusions
demonstrate that a particular definition of science is overly inclusive
highlight the inherent difficulty of distinguishing science from other types of knowledge

content.answer: demonstrate that a particular definition of science is overly inclusive

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Describe the line of reasoning and explain whether it supports an argument's overarching thesis.
